name: Art80G InteractivePoster
description:
This Poster is for the game: Ace Combat Zero.

This project is shorter than i might have expected, due to the fact that i had to restart the project due to changing from p5 to Twine.

There really is no walkthrough as all paths will eventually lead to an ending, however the fastest route to victory is click the keep silent and approach, and then select both options that say something akin to "Speed up and approach" or "steady youself and head towards your enemy"
